if (npcs.npcType ==

And after the last } add your code.

item.title: How do I add an NPC and how do I make it talk?
item.dc:creator: @needhoster needhoster
item.description:
@needhoster wrote:

[quote=“tonypker13, post:9, topic:242758”]Right click autospawn, press ‘Open With’ and choose notepad.[/quote]thanks!![br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 10, 2008, 04:57:21 pm[/size][hr]

if (npcs[i].npcType == NPC Id) {
if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “message to be sent”;
}
}
where do I put this in the NPChandler.java?

Read full topic

item.source: How do I add an NPC and how do I make it talk?

item.title: How do I add an NPC and how do I make it talk?
item.dc:creator: @needhoster needhoster
item.description:
@needhoster wrote:

[quote=“tonypker13, post:5, topic:242758”][quote author=legend-scape link=topic=319081.msg2528840#msg2528840 date=1226354591]

How the hell do you have 23 rep??

Adding NPC’s:
Autospawn.cfg

Talking Dialogue:
Npchandler.java

how the hell have u got 200 rep++?
he needs to no the codes not wer to put em,…
[/quote]
Because I’m one of the most well known here?

[quote author=needhoster link=topic=319081.msg2528841#msg2528841 date=1226354651]

How the hell do you have 23 rep??

Adding NPC’s:
Autospawn.cfg

Talking Dialogue:
Npchandler.java
[/quote]Could you give me like a mini tut? like what to do once im at autospawn.cfg? Btw, I got 23 rep by a random REP++:)

Autospawn code:

spawn = NPC ID	xxxx	yyyy	0	0	0	0	0	2	name

xxxx and yyyy are X and Y coordinates.

Dialogue code:

if (npcs[i].npcType == NPC Id) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "message to be sent"; } } [/quote]how do i fricking edit the thing??

Read full topic
item.source: How do I add an NPC and how do I make it talk?

item.title: How do I add an NPC and how do I make it talk?
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

[quote=“legend-scape, post:3, topic:242758”][quote author=tonypker13 link=topic=319081.msg2528836#msg2528836 date=1226354498]
How the hell do you have 23 rep??

Adding NPC’s:
Autospawn.cfg

Talking Dialogue:
Npchandler.java
[/quote]

how the hell have u got 200 rep++?
he needs to no the codes not wer to put em,…[/quote]
Because I’m one of the most well known here?

[quote=“needhoster, post:4, topic:242758”][quote author=tonypker13 link=topic=319081.msg2528836#msg2528836 date=1226354498]
How the hell do you have 23 rep??

Adding NPC’s:
Autospawn.cfg

Talking Dialogue:
Npchandler.java
[/quote]Could you give me like a mini tut? like what to do once im at autospawn.cfg? Btw, I got 23 rep by a random REP++:)[/quote]
Autospawn code:

spawn = NPC ID	xxxx	yyyy	0	0	0	0	0	2	name

xxxx and yyyy are X and Y coordinates.

Dialogue code:

                    if (npcs[i].npcType == NPC Id) {
                        if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) {
                            npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
                            npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
                            npcs[i].textUpdate = "message to be sent";
                        }
                    }
